title: Free Agency Day 2 Winners & Losers: Tom Brady leaves Patriots to sign with Bucs (Football 3/18)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap free agency news and notes from Tuesday. The biggest story on Day 2 and maybe in the history of free agency was Tom Brady's decision to leave the Patriots and join the Buccaneers (3:15). Why? How? Wait, what!? The Pick Six Superfriends break down all angles of the unfathomable change of scenery for TB12. The guys also issue winners & losers to other moves, including Philip Rivers heading to to the Colts (29:00), the Panthers moving on from Cam Newton and signing Teddy Bridgewater (37:30) and much more.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
